summary: Adventures of three young women in a hot and lazy Paris in summer.
cast: Marianne Denicourt|Nathalie Richard|Laurence Côte|André Marcon|Bruno Todeschini|Wilfred Benaïche|Marcel Bozonnet|Philippe Dormoy|Enzo Enzo|Pierre Lacan|Stéphanie Schwartzbrod|Christine Vézinet|Anna Karina|László Szabó|Alain Rigout|Lise Marsan|Patrick Martinez|Jean-Luc Drochies|Pierre Gerbaux|Laurent Schilling|Jean Bolognesi|Bertrand Lajudie|Laurent Cokelaere|Bruno Dandrimont|Emmanuel Lacordaire|Denis Leloup|Pierre Mimeran|Bertrand Richard|Nathalie Eno|Jacques Rivette
title: Alto bajo frágil
